title: References
text:
Abhyankar, Swapna, Dina Demner-Fushman, and Clement J McDonald. 2012.
“Standardizing Clinical Laboratory Data for Secondary Use.”
Journal of Biomedical Informatics 45 (4): 642–50.


Brat, Weber, G. A. 2020. “International Electronic Health
Record-Derived COVID-19 Clinical Course Profiles: The 4ce
Consortium.” Npj Digit. Med. 3, 109 (2020), August. https://doi.org/10.1038/s41746-020-00308-0.


Hernandez, Penni, Tanya Podchiyska, Susan Weber, Todd Ferris, and Henry
Lowe. 2009. “Automated Mapping of Pharmacy Orders from Two
Electronic Health Record Systems to RxNorm Within the STRIDE Clinical
Data Warehouse.” In AMIA Annual Symposium Proceedings,
2009:244. American Medical Informatics Association.


Hong, Chuan, Everett Rush, Molei Liu, Doudou Zhou, Jiehuan Sun, Aaron
Sonabend, Victor M Castro, et al. 2021. “Clinical knowledge extraction via sparse embedding
regression (KESER) with multi-center large scale electronic health
record data.” NPJ Digital Medicine 4 (1): 1–11.


Liu R, Whipple S, Rizzo S. 2021. “Evaluating Eligibility Criteria
of Oncology Trials Using Real-World Data and AI.”
Nature, April. https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-021-03430-5.


McDonald, Clem, Stan Huff, J Suico, and Kathy Mercer. 2004.
“Logical Observation Identifiers Names and Codes
(LOINC) Users’ Guide.” Indianapolis: Regenstrief
Institute.


Wei, Wei-Qi, Lisa Bastarache, Robert Carroll, Joy Marlo, Travis
Osterman, Eric Gamazon, Nancy Cox, Dan Roden, and Joshua Denny. 2017.
“Evaluating Phecodes, Clinical Classification Software, and
ICD-9-CM Codes for Phenome-Wide Association Studies in the Electronic
Health Record.” PLOS ONE 12 (July): e0175508. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0175508.


Wu, Patrick, Aliya Gifford, Xiangrui Meng, Xue Li, Harry Campbell, Tim
Varley, Juan Zhao, et al. 2019. “Mapping ICD-10 and ICD-10-CM
Codes to Phecodes: Workflow Development and Initial Evaluation.”
JMIR Med Inform 7 (4): e14325. https://doi.org/10.2196/14325.


Zhou, Doudou, Ziming Gan, Xu Shi, Alina Patwari, Everett Rush, Clara-Lea
Bonzel, Vidul A Panickan, et al. 2022. “Multiview Incomplete
Knowledge Graph Integration with Application to Cross-Institutional EHR
Data Harmonization.” Journal of Biomedical Informatics
133: 104147.
